pages.text:
Our Story
In 1972, Harry found the perfect space for his own venture, Harry's at Hanover Square, in the basement of the historical India House building. Together with his wife Adrienne, Harry successfully opened three locations, with additional spaces within the American Stock Exchange building as well as in the Woolworth building.
Our Mission
A Wall Street institution for over 50 years, Harry's flagship location at 1 Hanover Square is situated in the iconic and historic financial district of Lower Manhattan. It has established itself as a trusted location for business meetings, family dinners, or a quick drink at the bar.
Our evolution
After celebrating 50 years in business, we are excited to open our new location in downtown West Palm Beach. Harry's West Palm Beach aims to capture the essence of our original New York's Financial District location with a fresh approach to our bar and dining room design. Our executive chef, Joseph Mallol, has crafted a menu that maintains the culinary authenticity of our New York roots while incorporating fresh ingredients from local purveyors.

Sommelier
Series 2025
Join us at Harry's for an inside look at the art of winemaking with our
2025 Sommelier Series.
Sip wines paired perfectly with our dishes while dining alongside the winemakers themselves.
View our events
You're Invited
Harry's Wine Dinners provide intimate access to the minds behind some of the world's most intriguing vintages. Whether you're a wine enthusiast eager to go straight to the source or just looking to casually expand your wine knowledge, our welcoming dinners intend to provide a personal experience where everyone feels at home. Harryâs sommeliers' seasoned guidance turn each dinner into a one-of-a-kind night to remember with great company, great food, and great wine stories straight from the source.
New Events Coming Soon.
